casebody.data:
STOKES
v.
CRUMPTON 168A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Kieran J. Shanahan, Attorney at Law, Christopher S. Battles, Attorney at Law, John E. Branch, III, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Stokes, Thomas A. (III). K. Edward Greene, Attorney at Law, Tobias S. Hampson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Crumpton, Catherine C. (formerly Stokes). Robert A. Ponton, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of May 2016 by Plaintiff for Leave to Amend Notice of Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016." Edmunds, J. recused
